text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump More lies. 

Trump didn’t deliver any of that stuff. He did take most if not all of it from hospitals in the hardest-hit states, however. 

https://t.co/1ArZuBg68t

The fake “president” is currently guilty of over 40,000 counts of negligent manslaughter and 2nd degree murder.
